alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 3:21PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL STILLWATER...WEST CENTRAL SWEET GRASS AND CENTRAL PARK COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM MDT... At 320 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles south of Livingston, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Creek and Mc Leod. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Paradise Valley
